features.name: Pack Tactics
features.text: If another Dire Wolf is in Melee, standard attack deals 1d6+5 phy instead and you gain 1 Fear. [cite: 45709]

features.name: Hobbling Strike
features.text: Make attack (Melee). On success, deal 3d4+10 direct phy and target is Vulnerable until they clear 1 HP. [cite: 45710-45711]
